overview: Dana’s Story is an adaptation of Amazon’s Best-Selling urban fiction novel, “Behind Closed Doors: Dana’s Story” by A.L Smith. Based on a true story, the critically acclaimed novel is a fictionalized depiction of one little girl’s experience as a victim of domestic human trafficking.
tagline: After the imprisonment of her father, a young girl is forced into human trafficking...her mother brokers the deal.
title: Dana's Story
